Text: It's just the beta drivers from ATI and nvidia to fix some issues with Bioshock. These are avaliable on their websites as well.
you dont need these.  I tried playing with the old drivers and theres no difference.
and they caused instability in my system.  They are beta drivers after all.

These drivers fix issues - IF you have them
The ATI hotfix drivers can be treated as Catalyst 7.9 betas - as that's what AMD's employee calls them.
